titleStmt.title: Verses, presented to his masters in the ward of St. Giles's Cripplegate, within the Freedom. / By William Briscoe, bell-man.
titleStmt.author: Briscoe, William.

publicationStmt.date: Printed Decemb. the 24th, in the year M.DC.LX.VII. [1667]

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Christmass is come; The great Cathedral Feast ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
